_header: Of the holy feast of Innocents that ended their life in great tourment
Note: Shorter meter than in other South English Legendary texts.
Title(s): South English Legendary; ‘Of þe holi feste of inocens’
_description: ‘Of þe holi feste of inocens’ in one MS of the South English Legendary — 166 long lines, mostly in couplets written as a single line

Bod779.First Lines:
Of þe holy feste of Inosent þat endid here lyf In gret
                    turmentIs good to honoure & to holde boþe of ȝong &
                    of olde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now lord king of heuene a boue for his holy Inosentis
                    [loue]send vs grace so to spede þat we haue heuene to oure
                    mede
Bod779.Attributed Title: Of þe holi feste of inocens (f. 265)
